info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 7:25AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF THE NIAGARA FRONTIER THIS MORNING... HAZARDS...The combination of a band of heavy snow and winds gusting to 55 mph is producing BLIZZARD conditions. Visibility within the band is ZERO. There are numerous vehicles stranded on the roadways. DO NOT attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 723 AM EST, a 10 to 15 mile wide band extended from Grand Island northeast across the Buffalo Northtowns and southern Niagara County, including the city of Niagara Falls. This band is expected to remain nearly stationary or drift a few miles north through 9 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Niagara Falls, North Tonawanda, Lockport, Amherst, Tonawanda, Grand Island, Pendleton, Middleport, Sanborn, Cambria Center, Pendleton Center, Rapids, Gasport and Wolcottsville. SAFETY INFO... Travel is nearly impossible in this area with blizzard conditions. &&
